title: Help with ranked teams
body:
Hey there. Recently I read about how ranked team names are locked after a couple games and even went to support to ask and got it confirmed. I think teams that have been inactive should become available, much like how inactive summoner names become available after a period of time. I'm bringing this up because there is really no use to inactive ranked teams, and maybe they have awesome names that active summoner wants to use. I know this may not be a big idea but I really think it should be taken into consideration.

Id appreciate some help for this to get changed.

replies.body:
I think you may be onto something here, and I think that's a pretty good idea. I wanted to let you know that suggestions on changes or concepts on features to be added should be posted to the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where they'll get more traction and views.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thanks for the reply. I will create another post on the misc boards and hope we can get onto something.
